title: Did the climate activist Greta Thönberg appear as a "expert" of the CNN Corona virus?
subtitle: The Swedish adolescent and climate activist joined a group of guests, including the Senior Commissioner of the Baseball League Rob Manfred.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The adolescent climate activist Greta Thönberg appeared in a CNN "expert group" in a programme on the Corona 19 virus epidemic.
